product_name: Native Eyewear Endura Polarized Reflex Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Native Endura Polarized Reflex Sunglasses offer unbeatable sun and glare protection in every type of light. Bring on the sun! Pink frames include 1 set of silver reflex polarized lens and 1 set of SportFlex(TM) lenses, for a total of 2 sets of lenses. Silver reflex lenses allow 10% light transmission and are suitable for extreme bright sun. Snap-Back(TM) interchangeable lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. Polarized Crystal Carbonate(R) lenses have the strongest hard coating available to protect against scratching. P.C.C.(R) lenses pass the rigorous ANSI Z80.3 tests for optical clarity and impact resistance while blocking 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Rhyno-Tuff(R) AIR frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Anti-Ocular Intrusion System(R), a 4-point configuration, helps prevent lenses from shooting into your face in the event of high-velocity impact. Frames are extremely lightweight, yet flexible and durable enough to withstand high velocity collisions. Self-adjusting Cushinol(TM) nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place, ensuring a soft feel and personalized fit. Venting system incorporated into the frames enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Cam-action spring hinges allow the temples to quickly lock into position. Additional SportFlex orange-yellow lenses have a blue mirror coating suitable for a range of low-light conditions including cloudy, overcast, dusk and dawn. Frames best fit small to medium faces. Native Endura Polarized Reflex Sunglasses come with a protective carrying case. Closeout.
short_description: Native Endura Polarized Reflex Sunglasses offer unbeatable sun and glare protection in every type of light. Bring on the sun!
